item.title: One of my favourite portraits from India so far. in Varanasi, this lady was sitting in her doorway, surrounded by friends or family (not sure but maybe both) and just looked co contented. I love the colours and expression here.
item.description: One of my favourite portraits from India so far. in Varanasi, this lady was sitting in her doorway, surrounded by friends or family (not sure but maybe both) and just looked co contented. I love the colours and expression here.

item.title: The #NakedCake made by my wife @kingersrk for @elizabeth.marlow and @brgmarlow, wedding from 2014. What a day it was!
item.description: The #NakedCake made by my wife @kingersrk for @elizabeth.marlow and @brgmarlow, wedding from 2014. What a day it was!

item.title: Another favourite from India. this one, from Khajuraho. I just love to colours here and his expression. this was an old village where everyone was so pleased to be photographed. they loved to see their images in the camera. With no Hindi at my disposal, it was a fun way of communicating!
item.description: Another favourite from India. this one, from Khajuraho.
